ratings.comment: Mr. Martin is a neat fella

Hunter was an awesome professor. His lectures are very interesting and he is young so he better relates to the people taking his class than other professors here. Tests are challenging but if you listen in lecture and do the readings it is not hard to get a B. Really recommend him for any class that he teaches
Not only is this the sexiest professor on campus but he is funny and his lectures relate to students well. His exams are very fair but you need to put some work into it.

My favorite TA ever!! Not only is he gorgeous, but this guy helped me so much in preparing for exams. Really made sure we understood the topics, and wrote out outlines/themes on the board. I always got As and Bs on my papers from him. Get Hunter if you can!!
he is a great TA and I always loved going to discussion....his hottness was also a good reason to go....
Amazing lecturer!  Really helpful, nice, and knows what he is talking about, take him if you can.
